message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.CL 

This paper discusses the problem of explaining the decisions made by artificial intelligence systems, which is a core topic in the field of AI (cs.AI). The paper also focuses on providing explanations that match the mental model of the consumer, which is related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The framework introduced in the paper involves machine learning models, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the fairness and accuracy of decisions made by AI systems, which is related to cybersecurity (cs.CY). Finally, the paper mentions the use of natural language processing to generate explanations, which is a subfield of computational linguistics (cs.CL).
